name: A Dark Malfunction
description:
Overview

Dark Malfunction is an action survival game where you must avoid hostile drones and the darkness that quickly consumes your mind. You must keep the lights on using fuses you find as you frantically search for fuel that the back-up generator desperately needs.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Interact

This game is still in developmental stage: 

  • Please use Alt+F4 to exit the game. 

Questionnaire
